Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kostner
ShortDescription: #70 Division buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Division, Kostner, North Avenue, Cicero and Division due to police activity near Division/Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Kostner, North Avenue, Cicero, then resume their normal route on Division due to police activity near Division/Kostner.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/26th
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Kedzie, Cermak, Kostner, 26th and over regular route, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Kedzie, Cermak, Kostner, 26th and over regular route, due to street blockage near Kedzie/26th.

Allow extra travel time.
